actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.

official_title: To designate a mountain and icefield in the State of Alaska as the "Mount Stevens" and "Ted Stevens Icefield", respectively.
short_title: Mount Stevens and Ted Stevens Icefield Designation Act

summary.text: Mount Stevens and Ted Stevens Icefield Designation Act - Directs the United States Board on Geographic Names to designate: (1) a specified unnamed peak in the Alaska Range near Denali Park in Alaska as "Mount Stevens"; and (2) a specified icefield in the northern Chugach Forest in Alaska as the "Ted Stevens Icefield."

titles.title: Mount Stevens and Ted Stevens Icefield Designation Act
To designate a mountain and icefield in the State of Alaska as the "Mount Stevens" and "Ted Stevens Icefield", respectively.
